abstract: We're keeping an eye on the #whyIwrite Twitter messages all day to bring you a roundup of who posts and what they say.
snippet: We're keeping an eye on the #whyIwrite Twitter messages all day to bring you a roundup of who posts and what they say.
lead_paragraph: Today is the National Day on Writing (yes, it's a real thing), and we'll be celebrating - and updating this post - all day long.

headline.main: Blogging the National Day on Writing
